title: Speed of child and sled after jump

content.question: As shown in the figure above, a child of mass 20 kg who is running at a speed of 4.0 m/s jumps onto a stationary sled of mass 5.0 kg on a frozen lake. The speed at which the child and sled begin to slide across the ice is most nearly

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
